alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Warren, southeastern Morgan, central Putnam, northern Hancock, Greene, Taliaferro and southern Wilkes Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Loce to near Sandy Cross to Reynolds at Lake Oconee, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Washington, Madison, Greensboro, Warrenton, Sparta, Crawfordville, Union Point, Woodville, White Plains, Siloam, Norwood, Buckhead, Sharon, Camak, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Springfield, and Veazey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight EDT for central, northeastern and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Hancock; Morgan; Putnam; Taliaferro; Warren; Wilkes
